DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate impact specifically design ankle foot orthosis ( AFO , hinge , Tamarack joint adjustable check strap ) spatial temporal gait parameter , electromyography ( EMG ) walk endurance , select individual live Parkinson 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Lower Extremity Ankle Foot Orthoses Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This study 10 week long . Following fitting unilateral bilateral custom-fabricated AFOs subject participate 4 gait training session week 1 , 2 , 7 . Each training session 45-60 minute duration . Various outcome measure complete follow time : time consent ( T1 ) , treatment 1 time brace delivery ( T2 ) , week 5 ( T3 ) , week 10 ( T4 ) . Subjects closely monitor throughout 10 week study unenrolled self-request follow medical reason : 1 . New diagnosis direct consequence affect gait training , 2 . Inability tolerate study AFO ( ) .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis Parkinson 's Disease Between age 50 75 Ability walk 150 foot independently level surface without assistive device Stable medication usage duration study ( 10 week ) Obvious gait dysfunction ( Observational Gait Analysis ) Score great 22 Short OrientationMemoryConcentration Test Body mass index great 35 Dorsiflexion range motion less neutral ( 90 degree ) Any uncontrolled health condition gait training contraindicate
